20101216195326.667|20101216195328.333|CCO|THE PROBLEM IS THERE ARE ABOUT 
20101216195328.333|20101216195330.000|CCO|$8 BILLION WORTH OF EARMARKS IN 
20101216195330.000|20101216195331.667|CCO|THAT MEASURE AND, REMEMBER, THE 
20101216195331.667|20101216195333.333|CCO|GOP AFTER THE RECENT ELECTION, 
20101216195333.333|20101216195335.000|CCO|REPUBLICAN MEMBERS OF CONGRESS 
20101216195335.000|20101216195336.667|CCO|VOWED NOT TO VOTE FOR EARMARKS.
20101216195336.667|20101216195338.333|CCO|SO THEY CAN'T PASS THIS BILL 
20101216195338.333|20101216195340.000|CCO|UNLESS THEY VOTE FOR EARMARKS.

20101216195343.333|20101216195345.000|CCO|PARTY PATRIOTS HAVE SAID IF 
20101216195345.000|20101216195346.667|CCO|MEMBERS OF CONGRESS VOTE FOR 
20101216195346.667|20101216195348.333|CCO|THIS BILL WITH THE EARMARKS, 
20101216195348.333|20101216195350.000|CCO|THEY WILL PAY FOR IT.
20101216195350.000|20101216195351.667|CCO|THEY SAY THEY WILL POST PRIMARY 
20101216195351.667|20101216195353.333|CCO|CHALLENGES TO REPUBLICANS WHO 
20101216195353.333|20101216195355.000|CCO|SUPPORT IT.

20101216195356.667|20101216195358.333|CCO|CAUTION FOR MEMBERS WHO ARE

20101216195410.000|20101216195411.429|CCO|PRESIDENT OBAMA LOOKING AHEAD TO
20101216195411.429|20101216195412.857|CCO|2012.
